snippet: Bucks readers post six-word memoirs about work, inspired by the Smith Magazine book filled with similar recollections.
abstract: Bucks readers post six-word memoirs about work, inspired by the Smith Magazine book filled with similar recollections.
lead_paragraph: If you're a fan of Smith Magazine (and if you're not, you should be) you know about the six-word format that it has helped popularize.

headline.main: Just Six Words About Your Work
